title: I.Sicily inscription 001244
support: Seemingly inscribed on a relief plaque of a seated grieving woman accompanied by a second smaller female figure.

layout.p: Gualtherus does not record the location of the text in relation to the relief.

provenanceFound._: Found 'in vico Ismorti', Messina, and preserved originally in the same place, as recorded by Gualtherus 1624 [1625].

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
